name: Trip to Mars
description: This game was made for GDevelop Weekend Jam #1 About: you are on a trip to Mars, and you have to complete the mission. I made this game In 24 hours. it's my first time making a game on GDevelop. Controller: Arrow keys ---> Move space_bar ----> Shoot Thank you for playing :) Link Liluo:https://liluo.io/jan_hunter/trip-to-mars
